description:
Jyugo escapes from prison again and Hajime Sugoroku goes looking for him again.
Uno, Nico, and Rock are having a good time in Building 13.
It’s a usual day for the inmates and guards.
Many things have happened, but it seems like nothing has changed in Nanba Prison.
But don’t let your guard down!
Mitsuru Hitokoe, sensing a disturbance in the air, goes spying on each building believing something will happen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanbaka wa Gag Anime de Aru.
ナンバカはギャグアニメである.
